sourcesContent:
<template >

<Navbar v-if="showNavbar" :userType="userType" />
  


<router-view></router-view>
</template>
<script>

import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import { eventBus } from './eventBus';


export default{
    components: {
        
        Navbar,
        showNavbar: false,
        
    },
    
    created() {

    this.checkBar();
    },
    watch: {
        // Route değişikliklerini izleyerek navbar'ı kontrol edebiliriz
        '$route'(home, login) {
        this.checkBar();
        }
    },
    methods: {
        checkBar() {
        this.showNavbar=eventBus.value.showNavBar;
        }
  }
    
    
}
</script>
